 1. Eligible subscribers: 
 
 Pre-paid subscribers recharge account (active, inactive, at the time of keeping subscription, in the first 10 top up) 
 Post-paid subscribers change to pre-paid subscribers can join this promotion. 
 
 2. Benefits: 
 
 Additional 50% top-up credits. 
 Unlimited times of top-up and value of scratch cards. 
 Applicable for every top up during promotion period, as following&#65306; 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Top up card 
 
 
 Bonus 
 
 
 
 
 KM2 credit (25%) 
 
 
 KM3 credit (25%)

 Notes: 
 
 0đ StarterKits recharge the first time will be applied 100% promotion (50% online, offline 50%) 
 
 3. Validity period: 
 
 31/05/2012 - 02/06/2012

 3 . &#12503;&#12525;&#12464;&#12521;&#12512;&#26399;&#38480;: 2012 &#24180; 5 &#26376; 31 &#26085;&#12363;&#12425; 2012 &#24180; 6 &#26376; 2 &#26085;&#12414;&#12391;&#12384;&#12290; 1. &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; 
 
 &#49440;&#48520; &#52649;&#51204; ( &#49324;&#50857;&#54616;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#48156;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#48156;&#49888; &#48143; &#49688;&#49888;&#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#54644;&#51648; &#50504; &#46108; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#52376;&#51020; 10 &#48264;&#50640; &#52649;&#51204;&#54620; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; ).
